hypothesis_content.title: ETH/BTC Ratio Reversal at Asian Session Open
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, extreme ETH/BTC ratio moves during US hours (20:00-04:00 UTC) will reverse at Asian session open (04:00 UTC) with 70%+ probability when accompanied by diverging volume patterns.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Asian traders (particularly Korean/Japanese) exhibit different ETH/BTC preferences than US traders. During neutral regimes without strong directional bias, these regional flow differences create predictable mean reversion patterns at session boundaries.
entry_conditions: ETH/BTC 4H ratio moves >1.5% in either direction during US hours
BTC volume during move < ETH volume (relative strength divergence)
Asian session opens (04:00-05:00 UTC) with initial continuation then 15-min rejection

exit_conditions.take_profit: Full retracement to pre-move ratio level
exit_conditions.time_exit: 8 hours after Asian open if no reversal

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Reversal success rate <60% over 100+ occurrences, or Asian session flows become correlated with US session directionality.
